questionbank.question: Structured Vs Unstructured
questionbank.answer: Structured Data :Structured data is in the form of rows and columns. Ex: Passenger data information in flight. UnStructured Data: The data which is not instructured format is called unstructured data. EX: facebook, twitter, linkedin etc.

questionbank.question: Features of HDFS
questionbank.answer: 1.HIGHLY FAULT-TOLERANT : Fault tolerance is the property that enables a system to continue operating properly in the event of the failure of some of its components. HDFS itself has a mechanism of highly fault-tolerant. Fot that we replicate data in multiple machines. A single data is not stored in a single machine, it is stored in the minimum of 3 machines.    2. HIGH THROUGHPUT : the quantity of raw material or information processed or communicated in a given period, especially by the computer. if we use useg 1 machine it takes 45mintes, if we take 10 machines it takes 4.5 minutes. Thiis is why it is hight throughtput. Yahoo uses 5000 of clusters to retrieve the data. throughtput is the amount of time it reads the data. It reads the data in paralle.     3. SUITABLE FOR APPLICATIONS WITH LARGE DATA SETS : Always makes the file size is larger    4. STREAMING ACCESS TO FILE SYSTEM DATA : Write Once and Read Many Times. You will not update the records again & again     5. CAN BUILD OUT OF COMMODITY HARDWARE :  It means without using highend servers it works fine.

questionbank.question: create a file using command prompt
questionbank.answer: type NUL > db.json, where db.json is the name of the file

questionbank.question: How can i determine the URL that a local git repository
git init
questionbank.answer: git remote add origin git repository

questionbank.question: What is DreamFactory
questionbank.answer: DreamFactory is an open source REST API platform for mobile, IoT, and web applications. DreamFactory automatically creates REST APIs for SQL, NoSQL, file storage, email, push notifications, remote HTTP services, remote SOAP services, and more.

questionbank.question: append .csv file using cmd
questionbank.answer: copy *.csv combine.csv, where copy is the name of the command. combine.csv is the name of the combined file

questionbank.question: How to select the last record from MYSQL table
questionbank.answer: select * from table_name ORDER BY id desc LIMIT 1

questionbank.question: why we use ng-app in angularjs programming
questionbank.answer: ng-app act as a main function of angularjs programming

questionbank.question: $http/$q
questionbank.answer: A service that helps you run functions asynchronously, and use thir return values (or exceptions) when they are done processing. Asynchronous: Asynchronous means you are not aware how much time your request will take to process. Synchronous:  Synchronous means request and reply, it means you are sending something, you are getting the response back immediately.
